content: a instep centered double decrease round 1 k1 tbl p1 6 times k1 tbl k2tog pm to ssk - slip 1 stitch as if to knit slip another stitch as indicate new beginning of round and start of instep if to knit insert left needle through the front loops work 43 sts in pattern as established pm to of the two slipped stitches and knit them together indicate start of heel ssk k1 tbl p1 18 times k1 sts round once five times then work round 1 once round 2 knit even across 43 instep sts k1 k 1 round 2 once only until 68 sts remain 37 43 tbl p1 18 times k1 tlb k1 instep sts/31 37 sole sts heel will be worked over 33 39 sts place foot continue working pattern as established until remaining 37 43 sts on a holder for instep heel foot is approximately 2 1/4 inches less than desired flap is worked back and forth foot length ending on round 7 of pattern stitch for instep row 1 wrong side slip 1 p 0 1 tbl *k1 p1 tbl1 repeat from * to last 2 1 stitches k1 0 p1 set-up round for toe knit to first marker slip 1 marker k 0 3 ssk k9 cdd twice k9 k2tog k row 2 slip 1 k 0 1 tbl *p1 k1 tbl repeat from * 0 3 slip marker knit to end of round 31 37 across to last 2 1 stitches p1 0 k1 1 instep sts/31 37 sole sts repeat row 1-2 until heel flap measures 2 ½ inches or desired length ending with row 2 knit even until foot is 1 3/4 inches less than desired foot length turn heel row 1 wrong side slip 1 p 19 23 p2tog p1 toe turn round 1 decrease round knit to last 3 stitches row 2 slip 1 k8 10 ssk k1 turn before first marker k2tog k1 slip marker k1 row 3 slip 1 p9 11 p2tog p1 turn ssk knit across to last 3 stitches before second row 4 slip 1 k10 12 ssk k1 turn marker k2tog k1 slip marker k1 ssk knit to continue working one more stitch until all the end stitches have been worked you should end on a round 2 k knit row with 21 25 stitches remaining do not turn work begin gusset work decrease round once knit 3 rounds even work decrease round once knit 2 rounds even gusset pick up and knit one stitch in each slipped twice work decrease round once knit 1 round stitch along side of heel place marker for gusset even 3 times work decrease round only until 18 knit 37 43 instep stitches in pattern stitch for 22 sts remain use kitchener stitch to graft toes instep place marker for
